r.s: A better autoloader for the Zend_Framework.
r.d: A better autoloader for the Zend Framework: http://github.com/lagged/Lagged_loader
r.n: * bugfix in Lagged_LibraryLoader: when supplied via __construct(), appDir was not set * bugfix in Lagged_LibraryLoader: app dir was assuming it contained 'app'
